strapiPost.title: Start Christmas Shopping At Siloam Springsâ€™ Holiday Open House
strapiPost.content:
Get a jumpstart on holiday shopping at the Holiday Open House on Main St in Siloam Springs this upcoming Sunday, Nov 13 from 1-5p. 

  • Come on in: Downtown Siloam retail shops and restaurants will open their doors to shoppers, offering holiday wares and gifts. 
  • Please pick me: Every purchase made at participating businesses will give shoppers the opportunity to enter to win a door prize giveaway. 

See more information about the event HERE.
